Emergency Exit Seat.uidescription: Press LShift + H to engage emergency exit

Dynamic Zoom Toggle (abs.).uidescription: Holds the dynamic zoom as long as the button is held

Cycle mouse mode (VJoy / Relative).uidescription: Switches the mouse behavior for ship rotations between a relative (FPS style) and a Vjoy mode.

Throttle - Forward / Back Invert.uidescription: Inverts Strafe Longitudinal Absolute Axis Half (Neutral - Backward)

Speed Limiter - On/Off (Hold / Toggle).uidescription: Toggles Speed Limiter on and off

Speed Limiter - Reset to SCM.uidescription: Resets Speed Limiter to full SCM.

Acceleration Limiter Up / Down (rel.).uidescription: Acceleration Limiter Up / Down (rel.) - Decreases / increases acceleration limiter relative to old value

Acceleration Limiter Up / Down (abs.).uidescription: Acceleration Limiter Up / Down (abs.) - Decreases / increases acceleration limiter.

Lock Pitch / Yaw Movement (Toggle / Hold.uidescription: While active no rotational inputs are allowed to your ship. This is useful for arresting movement when you lost control using a mouse.

Cycle Configuration.uidescription: Cycle between the vehicle's expanded and retracted configurations.

Request Landing.uidescription: Contacts ATC and other landing services.

Reset Flight Accelerometer.uidescription: Resets the max endured Gs for the accelerometer.

Enable / Disable Look Ahead.uidescription: Enables and disables Look Ahead Mode

Enable / Disable Target Padlock (Toggle,.uidescription: Allows you to track a locked target with your head

Auto Zoom On Selected Target On / Off (T.uidescription: Allows you to enable and disable auto zoom on selected targets.

Increase Scanning Angle\u00a0.uidescription: Increase the angle of the Scanning Cone

Decrease Scanning Angle.uidescription: Decrease the angle of the Scanning Cone

Salvage Mode Gimbal (Toggle).uidescription: Toggle between gimbled and fixed salvage targeting modes.

Increase Beam Spacing.uidescription: Increase the spacing between the Vulture's two salvage heads.

Decrease Beam Spacing.uidescription: Decrease the spacing between the Vulture's two salvage heads.

Relative Beam Spacing.uidescription: Adjust the relative spacing between the Vulture's two salvage heads.

Absolute Beam Spacing.uidescription: Adjust the absolute spacing between the Vulture's two salvage heads.

Salvage Beam Axis (Toggle).uidescription: Set the orientation axis of the salvage beam to vertical or horizontal.

Cycle Left Salvage Modifiers.uidescription: Cycle through available modifiers on the left salvage head or salvage turret.

Cycle Right Salvage Modifiers.uidescription: Cycle through available modifiers on the right salvage head or salvage turret.

Manual Gimbal Mode - Swap VJoy / Look Di.uidescription: This will cause the aim reticle to either follow the VJoy indication on the HUD or your look direction.

Cycle Fire Mode (Staggered / Combined).uidescription: Cycle through staggered and combined fire modes.

Manual Convergence Distance (rel.).uidescription: Sets the manual convergence distance on a relative axis

Manual Convergence Distance - Reset.uidescription: Resets the Manual Convergence Distance to the default value

Weapon Presets - Set Quantum Jammers (sh.uidescription: Weapon Presets - Set Quantum Jammers (short range)

Weapon Presets - Set Quantum Snares / Pu.uidescription: Weapon Presets - Set Quantum Snares / Pulse (long range)

Bombs - Increase HUD Range.uidescription: Increases range by one step in the bomb alignment HUD

Bombs - Reset HUD Range.uidescription: Resets to the default range in the bomb alignment HUD

Decoy - Increase Burst Size (tap).uidescription: Increases the burst size by one.

Decoy - Decrease Burst Size (tap).uidescription: Decreases the burst size by one.

Decoy - Panic Launch (tap).uidescription: Launches a large percentage of the countermeasure magazine.

Cycle Pitch Ladder Mode.uidescription: Cycles the pitch ladder mode between off, HUD, look direction and mixed.

Wipe Helmet Visor.uidescription: Quickly wipe your helmet visor to improve visibility

Toggle Turret Mouse Movement (VJoy, FPS.uidescription: Enables / Disables relative mouse mode for turrets

Turret - Speed Limiter - On/Off (Hold/To.uidescription: Toggles the limiter for the rotational turret speed

Turret - Speed Limiter - Increase (rel).uidescription: Increases the speed of the turret.

Turret - Speed Limiter - Decrease (rel).uidescription: Decreases the speed of the turret.

Weapon Zeroing Decrease.uidescription: Adjust the weapon scope to accommodate a closer target distance into sighting.

Weapon Zeroing Increase / Auto.uidescription: Adjust the weapon scope to accommodate a farther target distance into sighting.

Wipe Helmet Visor.uidescription: Quickly wipe your helmet visor to improve visibility

Free View Camera (Hold).uidescription: Holding allows free view camera in third person

Recall Last Vehicle.uidescription: Activate ship recall on the last flying vehicle used

Tractor Beam - Increase Distance.uidescription: Increases the target distance for an object controlled with the Tractor Beam.

Tractor Beam - Decrease Distance.uidescription: Decreases the target distance for an object controlled with the Tractor Beam.

Confirm Launch.uidescription: Confirms the launch of the vehicle

Wipe Helmet Visor.uidescription: Quickly wipe your helmet visor to improve visibility

Dynamic Zoom Toggle (abs.).uidescription: Holds the dynamic zoom as long as the button is held

Lock Pitch / Yaw Movement (Toggle / Hold.uidescription: While active no rotational inputs are allowed to your ship. This is useful for arresting movement when you lost control using a mouse.

@ui_ciuichatcyclelobby.uidescription: Press to cycle through subscribed lobbies in chat

Head Tracking (Hold).uidescription: Enables head tracking as long as the button is held down

Enable / Disable Head Tracking for 3rd P.uidescription: Enables or disables head tracking in external cameras.
